name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro
description: Latest smartphone from Apple with 128GB storage, A17 Bionic chip, and titanium design.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: Flagship phone with a 200MP camera, S Pen support, and 512GB storage.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Noise-canceling over-ear headphones with 30 hours of battery life.

name: Apple MacBook Air M2
description: 13-inch laptop with M2 chip, 8GB RAM, and 256GB SSD.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus
description: High-performance laptop with a 13.4-inch display, Intel Core i7, and 512GB SSD.

name: Samsung 65-inch QLED TV
description: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV with Quantum Dot technology and HDR support.

name: LG 55-inch OLED TV
description: Premium 4K OLED TV with deep blacks and Dolby Vision support.

name: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and 6 hours of battery life.

name: GoPro HERO11 Black
description: Action camera with 5.3K60 video recording and HyperSmooth 5.0 stabilization.

name: Canon EOS R10 Mirrorless Camera
description: Compact mirrorless camera with 24.2 MP sensor and 4K video support.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Smartwatch with advanced health tracking, always-on Retina display, and 18-hour battery life.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch6
description: Fitness-focused smartwatch with Wear OS and heart rate monitoring.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Vacuum
description: Cordless vacuum cleaner with laser dust detection and advanced HEPA filtration.

name: KitchenAid Stand Mixer
description: Classic 5-quart stand mixer with 10 speeds and multiple attachments.

name: PlayStation 5 Console
description: Next-gen gaming console with ultra-fast SSD and stunning 4K graphics.
